description: This table contains information about a dental billing plan.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the treatment plan record.

columns.name: PLAN_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The description of the dental treatment plan.

columns.name: PLAN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the plan type. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Predetermination


Orthodontic

columns.name: PLAN_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the plan status. This is usually the same as the internal ID. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Community ID (CID).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


New


Pending


Submitted


Authorized


Voided


Terminated


UNUSED


Invalid Coverage


Replaced

columns.name: PLAN_CREATION_DATE
columns.description: The date the dental treatment plan was created.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor account. This column is frequently used to link to the ACCOUNT table.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage associated with the dental treatment plan. This column is frequently used to link to the COVERAGE table.

columns.name: PRICING_CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the pricing contract associated with the dental treatment plan. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_ECP table.

columns.name: PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the provider record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the department record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_DEP table.

columns.name: SERVICE_AREA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the service area record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_SA table.

columns.name: TOTAL_CHARGE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The total charge amount for the dental treatment plan.

columns.name: PATIENT_AMOUNT
columns.description: Patient amount of the dental treatment plan. This is self-pay portion of the total charge amount.

columns.name: BANDING_DATE
columns.description: Banding date for orthodontic treatment. It is used on claim and identifies the date the braces were applied.

columns.name: PATIENT_CHG_PX_ID
columns.description: A unique ID of the procedure which is associated with the patient of the dental treatment plan. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EAP table.

columns.name: INSURANCE_CHG_PX_ID
columns.description: A unique ID of the procedure which is associated with the insurance of the dental treatment plan. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EAP table.

columns.name: SKIP_PREDETERMINATION_YN
columns.description:
Flag to indicate that no predetermination claim needs to be sent.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: SOURCE_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: Represents the Estimate record used to create this dental billing plan, if applicable.

columns.name: DTP_USER_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status of a Dental Billing Plan as shown on DTP activity. This may be overridden by end users and can be different from PLAN_STATUS_C, which is the system status of this billing plan.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Pending


Submitted


Authorized


Voided


Terminated


Completed


Invalid Coverage


Replaced

columns.name: REPL_BY_TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: When a dental billing plan record is replaced, the record that replaced this one will be populated here.
